org.artorg.tools.phantomData.server.boot

Class Booter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.artorg.tools.phantomData.server.boot.Booter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PropertiesBooter

    public abstract class Booter
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for booting with startup and console frame. Implement unsecuredBoot(String[]) and call securedBoot(String[]) for starting.

    Set a StartupProgressFrame for visualize the boot procedure.

    Set a ConsoleFrame and a ConsoleDiverter for showing a logging panel during boot procedure. It will shown if an error occurs or if debug mode is enabled.

      • unsecuredBoot

        protected abstract void unsecuredBoot(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main boot method. It's called from securedBoot(String[]). Call catchedBoot with command line arguments for starting successful.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments

      • setErrorOccured

        public void setErrorOccured(boolean errorOccured)
        Setting an switch so that the boot procedure can abort or handle it. Can be used for showing the ConsoleFrame.
        Parameters:
        errorOccured - true if an error is occurred.
